rules.ruleString: Must be enrolled in course type {09, 09-1, 09-4}

description: This unit serves both as an expansion of undergraduate background knowledge and as a preparation for further studies and research in the Journalism, Australian and/or Indigenous Studies. The unit content will focus on one or more broad topical themes to be advised beforehand.  Students will critically examine current research in the nominated field(s), and devise a research project to be approved by the lecturer.
